title: Matching NFL Players to Pro Scouting Grades
itunes:title: Matching NFL Players to Pro Scouting Grades
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks go through the professional grading scale and match NFL players that best exhibit the traits of each grade (29:20). The guys also continue the NFL vs College Football strategy debate that has raged on Twitter (23:05). Bucky also dives into his trip coaching at Nike's "The Opening" before DJ talks about his visit with EA to work on the Madden franchise (2:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
